introduction: 这是一个关于青春、友情、爱情的“悬疑”故事。通过电影镜头语言，剧中人物穿梭于生活与感悟。展现90后对爱情与友情的态度，在这两种珍贵的感情之间奋力挣扎，最后真正的懂得什么才是最宝贵的。This is a mysterious story about youthfulness, friendship and love. In front of the lens, the characters travel between real lives and their thoughts. This story depicts the attitudes towards love and friendship in the eyes of post 90s. They explore themselves hard between these two precious emotions and finally understand what they really cherish.
